ygData.subject: Re: Shadowstep vs. Fade
ygData.msgSnippet: You get a greater distance with Shadow Step. It has pulled me out of a jam more than once. Neme ...
ygData.messageBody:
You get a greater distance with Shadow Step. It has pulled me out of a jam more
than once.

Neme

At 09:40 AM 4/18/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: "Stefan Raets" <SRAETS@...>
>
>Can anyone tell me what is better about Shadowstep? From the
>description it seems very similar to Fade ... so why should I buy
>Shadowstep?
>
>Aznyin
>Erudite Wizard, level 10
